settings.newsletter_terms_text: By signing up, you agree to receive our email newsletter, which is tailored based on the information you provide (such as your account details) and your interactions (like playtime data) for advertising purposes. You can unsubscribe at any time without any cost. Please see our privacy policy for more details.
